statements: DELETE FROM augmented_reality_stats WHERE device_name = 'AR Glasses' AND battery_percentage < 20;
DELETE FROM headsets WHERE headset_name = 'Wireless Headphones';
DELETE FROM usage_statistics WHERE usage_id = 100 AND headset_id = 2;
DELETE FROM AR_Usage_Statistics WHERE user_id = 202 AND duration_minutes > 60;
DELETE FROM AR_Headsets WHERE device_id = 101 AND brand = 'Sony';
DELETE FROM AR_Devices WHERE weight > 4.0 AND battery_life <= 10;
DELETE FROM augmented_reality_headsets WHERE headset_id = 1 AND brand_name = 'Example'
DELETE FROM augmented_reality_devices WHERE device_id = 3 AND weight > 2.5
